content.rendered:
Happy Thanksgiving!

We are closed on Thanksgiving and will always be closed on Thanksgiving! We want our employees to spend the holiday with their loved ones. Gottwals is open normal business hours on Wednesday, Friday, and Saturday. We have Black Friday pricing every day!

Want a FREE $10 Gift Card?

Receive a free $10 Gottwals gift card with every $25 gift card purchased now until Christmas Eve! Gift cards are valid at all Gottwals locations (Byron, Perry, Macon, Warner Robins) and must be redeemed after Christmas Day.

excerpt.rendered: Receive a free $10 Gottwals gift card with every $25 gift card purchased now until Christmas Eve! We are closed on Thanksgiving and will always be closed on Thanksgiving! We want our employees to spend the holiday with their loved ones.
